subject: Order #SSN5591
description_text:
TRACKING # SF6047224805263
<https://www.sf-express.com/we/ow/chn/en/waybill/waybill-detail/SF6047224805263>
Ordered on12/31/25. Wondering on ETA? It's been 2 weeks? Said 5-7 days when
ordered. Thanks

conversations.body_text: Hi Brian Paquette,     Due to demand far exceeding expectations, this item has been out of stock for nearly two weeks. We will arrange shipment within the next two days and sincerely apologize for the delay.
